All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
DateFormatter
Holds date formats
DuplicateFriendshipException
Exception to be thrown if the friendship already exists
EmptyFieldException
Exception to be thrown if one of the attribute fields is empty
Entity<ID>
Generic entity with attribute id of type ID
Friendship
Extends Entity and has id of type Tuple of Integer and Integer
FriendshipInFileRepository
Friendship repository which stores Friendship objects inside file and memory
FriendshipValidator
Validates entity of type Friendship
IdZeroException
Exception to be thrown if id is equal to zero
ImpossibleAgeException
Exception for impossible age
InFileRepository<ID,EType extends Entity<ID>>
In file repository which stores data inside files and memory
InMemoryRepository<ID,EType extends Entity<ID>>
In memory repository which stores data inside memory
Main
 
Network
Network containing all the users
Repository<ID,EType extends Entity<ID>>
Repository interface which stores items of type EType with id type ID
Service
Service which manages user and friendship repositories
Tuple<Type1,Type2>
Generic class for holding two objects of different types
UI
Ui class for displaying console user interface
User
User class for defining a network user
UserInFileRepository
User repository which stores User objects inside files and memory
UserNotFoundException
Exception to be thrown if the user is not found inside the repo
UserValidator
Validates all the user's attributes
ValidationException
Exception for validation failure
Validator<EType>
Interface for generic validator
